intervals.description: Replace engine oil and oil filter. Warm engine first for complete drain.
intervals.torque_spec: Drain plug: 22 lb-ft (30 Nm), Oil filter: 18 lb-ft (24 Nm)
intervals.fluid_spec: 10W-30 JASO MA (Honda Pro GN4) — 3.4L with filter change

intervals.description: Check and adjust intake and exhaust valve clearances using shim-under-bucket system. Intake: 0.16-0.19mm, Exhaust: 0.22-0.27mm.
Drain and replace engine coolant. Bleed air from system after refill.
Replace all four spark plugs. Check electrode condition and gap before install.
Replace air filter element. Inspect more frequently in dusty conditions.
Check and adjust drive chain slack (25-35mm free play). Clean and lubricate 525 O-ring chain.
Lubricate drive chain after cleaning. Apply to inner side of chain while rotating rear wheel.
Replace front and rear brake fluid. Bleed system completely until fluid runs clear.
Inspect front and rear brake pad thickness. Replace when at minimum wear indicator.
Inspect and adjust throttle cable free play (2-6mm). Lubricate cables.
Replace front fork oil. Check fork seals for leaks and dust boots for damage.
intervals.fluid_spec: Honda SS-8 fork oil (10W) — 483ml per leg
